name: SNEAKING OUT
description:
You play as "Mike", well that's what he remembers his name is... He woke up in the snow outside some sort of high-security facility building, Mike doesn't remember anything except something he spent most of his life manufacturing: the A-DA (Anti-Detection Armour) Mike is a professional thief with this armour, but now he must retrieve the armour from an unknown enemy without its assistance.  Sneak in, retrieve what belongs to you, sneak out.

NOTE: this game may still contain a few minor bugs, but it should be playable and hopefully enjoyable!

Most recent update: I have changed the collectable texture, and collecting all 8 in each level unlocks a secret.
